Text: Why did you make a new torrent of this? That is to say, what is the difference between this and the one you uploaded in 2010?

@Cannon_Drive-by:

A little one ... learn about video encoding ... and you will find out about ... sources, type of encoding...  etc. !!! 

I did it for the collectors ... [my rig is something else right now... a lot  better ... but not what I had in my mind].

Cheers.
